explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the influence of renewable energy consumption, economic risk, and financial risk on the load capacity factor (LF) within the BRICS countries, using econometric methods like Method of Moments Quantile Regression (MMQR) and long-run estimators (FE-OLS, DOLS, FMOLS). There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies in the title or abstract.
